item.description:
About me

I'm a Research Engineer at AI System Dept. in DeNA.
I engage in Research and Development on Computer Vision and Machine Learning. If you see this biography and get interested in me, please contact me.

In my free time, I drink with my precious people, get inside the world of books, or travel around the world with my green backpack.

Interests

  • Research :
    I'm generaly interested in Computer Vision and Machine Learning.
    For details :
    Visual Representation Learning, Video Recognition, Generative Model,
    3D Vision (recent)
  • Application :
    Entertainment, Creation/Design, Automotive

Education

  M.S. in Computer Science and Electronic Engineering (2017.4 - 2019.5)
        Keio University, Aoki lab.
        Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki

  B.S. in Electronics and Electrical Engineering (2013.4 - 2017.4)
        Keio University, Aoki lab.
        Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki

  Ichikawa High School (2010.4 - 2013.3)
